name: Reincarnation
description: Ashes of the Tiger: A fierce warrior in ancient India dies defending his kingdom. He vows to protect his people in every life to come. Reborn as a stray tiger in a forest reserve centuries later, he senses danger approaching—a poacher’s trap. With uncanny instincts and a deep awareness of the land, the tiger leads the local ranger to uncover a vast smuggling network, saving the animals and people alike.
